name: Baggie 3: Da Nightmare
description:
Credit to SuperSonic68 for the Framework.

After Many, Many months, it's finally here. It has a whopping 8 Stages in the Intire game, Baggie also gets a New 3D Look! And Snake Eyes getting A New Tail! The Game also includes Snake Eye's Guide into taking over the world as a bonus! Plus, The Character models are now on Sketchfab!

Sketchfab Collection: https://sketchfab.com/sonictheonlyhedgehog/collections/b3dn-models

Mediafire Minor: https://www.mediafire.com/file/pgpe4ezdwiz1koz/B3DN.zip/file

Mediafire Prototype: https://www.mediafire.com/file/emjheh4k6lujf9j/Baggie_3_Da_Nightmare_%2528PLAYTESTER_EDITION%2529.zip/file

Dropbox Minor: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zxrebia2wmns0t8/B3DN.zip?dl=0

MEGA Minor: https://mega.nz/file/zTpSTQwR#OjCJDpdZCUHgjrQiA2JyFfkUqIY9w_xlRrWgHWNiEGY

GameJolt Minor: https://gamejolt.com/games/B3DN/607210

OST: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hrgzWEgCCFg&list=PLfSdxnQBEyeahUJRqYoJmg3yvS9BqZrOx #adventure
